availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William R. Field (Christian County, Kentucky, farmer.)

body.p: Christian County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Father of John R. Field. Married to Mary Long Field in Christian County, Kentucky, on May 6, 1841. Father of John R. Field, James Field, Caleb D. Field, and Theodosia Field. Stepfather of William A. Long Field and Sarah B. Long Field. Farmer in Christian County in 1850. Farmer in Christian County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Christian County, District 1, p. 496B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Christian County, p. 506.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Christian County Marriages, Film #001942963, p. 14.
